mapper.insert: insert into diagnostic_tests (member_id, patient_id, inspection_status, created_date, diag_id, hospital_code) values (#{memberId}, #{patientId}, #{inspectionStatus}, #{createdDate}, #{diagId}, #{hospitalCode})
mapper.select: select diag_test_id, member_id, patient_id, inspection_status, created_date, diag_id, hospital_code from diagnostic_tests where diag_id=#{diagId}

select diag_test_id, member_id, patient_id, inspection_status, created_date, diag_id, hospital_code from diagnostic_tests where member_id=#{memberId} and DATE(created_date) between #{startDate} and #{endDate}

select diag_test_id, member_id, patient_id, inspection_status, created_date, diag_id, hospital_code from diagnostic_tests where hospital_code = #{hospitalCode} and DATE(created_date) between #{startDate} and #{endDate}
mapper.update: update diagnosis_tests set inspection_status = 'DIAGNOSTIC_COMPLETED' where diag_test_id = #{diagTestId}
update diagnosis_tests set inspection_status = 'DIAGNOSTIC_PROCESSING' where diag_test_id = #{diagTestId}
